Devereux Emmet House

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Fireplace and surround in older portion

A beam in the original part of the house bears the date 1688, which indicates that Sherrewogue is one of the oldest houses in Head of the Harbor. The house remained in the [Adam] Smith family for more than 200 years. In 1889, Ella Batavia Smith married a lawyer, Devereux Emmet, and the Emmets purchased Sherrewogue. In 1895 they added a two-story western wing designed by Stanford White. -- https://www.nytimes.com/1983/07/10/nyregion/smith-estate-to-regain-its-splendor.html [work]
